name: Arbeau
description:
Hello, user!

Welcome to your first day at the Edison™ Corporation. We are so happy to see you. I am Arbeau Mk IX, but you can simply call me Arbeau.

As the Junior Associate Resource Provisioner, you are responsible for ensuring that each municipality receives the adequate capital from our sizable reserves.

Succeed, and I will heap upon you with exactly 1.92 seconds of praise. Fail, and there will be mass hysteria, incalculable tragedies, garnished wages, and – worst of all – a lowered stock price.

Are you ready?

Back to Ward Games
